title: Elon Musk rejects concerns over beds at Twitter HQ
description: The billionaire has previously told workers to commit to long hours or leave.

title: Nintendo lands Call of Duty in 10-year Microsoft deal
description: Microsoft says it has offered the same deal to Sony, with Call of Duty also continuing to appear on PCs.

title: New chatbot has everyone talking to it
description: Open AI's ChatGPT generates convincing human-like answers in response to human prompts.

title: Tech layoffs at Meta, Twitter, Amazon: The good people helping Indians find jobs
description: Tech workers are rallying together to help peers who face having to leave the US after being laid off.
